about.title: About
about.description: Everyone wants to have fun, but more than that, they want to make it an unforgettable experience. However, today's young people want to do this responsibly. In this context, Paradise Entretenimento seeks to hold sustainable events in paradisiacal places, in complete interaction with nature, using music and sport as parameters.
about.textMission: To provide entertainment experiences through music and sport, in a sustainable way and in balance with nature.
about.textVision: To be a reference as an entertainment channel adding audiovisual content about Reggae Music, Adventure Sports and paradisiacal places.
about.textValues: Culture, Sustainability, Adventure, Collaborative, Unity and Trip.

banner.title3: Let's Embark on This Journey Together!?

artists.title: Artists
artists.description: Paradise Entretenimento manages the career of Reggae artists, as it understands that the rhythm created in Jamaica synthesizes its intentions to generate messages and actions of peace and conscience through entertainment. Among our casting we can highlight the following artists:
artists.artist1Description: GrooVI emerged in Porto Alegre, inspired by the “backing bands” of the Virgin Islands. The acronym “VI” stands for “New Roots”, music with African spiritual foundations. The band makes an ancestral rescue to spirituality through Reggae, with lyrics that seek to awaken consciousness.
artists.artist2Description: Skafolia fuses traditional Carnival marches with SKA, a Jamaican rhythm created in the 60s, which gave rise to Reggae. Founded in Porto Alegre in 2011, it is the first SKA block in Brazil and is characterized by the irreverence of the vocals, added to the balance of the kitchen and the weight of the brass, forming a mixture of rhythms that only happens in Skafolia.

sport.title: Sport
sport.description: Paradise Entretenimento worships, among other adventure sports, slackline, a balance sport that puts people in contact with others and with themselves, also standing out for its direct contact with nature. Meet our Free Slack partner:
sport.artist1Description: Paradise Entretenimento has a partnership with Free Slack, an organization dedicated to the practice and dissemination of Slackline, a sport that is based on physical and mental balance, fundamental conditions for a healthy life. In addition to being a practice that adds and develops awareness and values ​​of unity, slackline contributes to a more peaceful society that is more integrated with the environment in which we live. Free Slack holds several events, developing workshops, presentations and social activities, aiming to provide opportunities for experience through sport.

events.title: Events
events.description: Paradise Entretenimento holds events that are sustainable and in balance with nature. This was the Paradise Experience, which took place at Clube Adventure in Porto Alegre, RS on December 10, 2017. The event featured diverse cultural activities including water sports such as Stand up Paddle and Windsurfing, as well as Slackline, Acroyoga and Fabric Workshops . In Gastronomy we offer traditional Food Trucks, Natural Food and Craft Beer. All this surrounded by lots of nature, good music and great vibes provided by special musical attractions that complemented this experience. We had special shows on a leisure day to enjoy with friends and enjoy the best of summer. Welcome to Paradise!
events.artist1Description: Paradise Entretenimento has a partnership with Free Slack, an organization dedicated to the practice and dissemination of Slackline, a sport that is based on physical and mental balance, fundamental conditions for a healthy life. In addition to being a practice that adds and develops awareness and values ​​of unity, slackline contributes to a more peaceful society that is more integrated with the environment in which we live. Free Slack holds several events, developing workshops, presentations and social activities, aiming to provide opportunities for experience through sport.

groovi.title: GrooVI
groovi.description: GrooVI emerged in Porto Alegre, inspired by the “backing bands” of the Virgin Islands. The acronym “VI” stands for “New Roots”, music with African spiritual foundations. The band makes an ancestral rescue to spirituality through Reggae, with lyrics that seek to awaken consciousness, leading to a reflection on the Western way of life where materialism and a disrespectful relationship with nature predominate, but also bring messages loaded with positive vibrations and messages of hope, using the mantra of Reggae music as an instrument of meditation and transformation.
groovi.pressKitText: Download the GROOVI press kit containing files to create promotional materials for shows and events! CONTAINS: Technical Rider, Stage Map, High resolution photos, release and the band's logo.
groovi.socialMediaText: FIND OUT MORE ABOUT GROOVI VISITING THEIR SOCIAL NETWORKS:

skafolia.title: Skafolia
skafolia.description: Skafolia fuses traditional Carnival marches with SKA, a Jamaican rhythm created in the 60s, which gave rise to Reggae. Founded in Porto Alegre in 2011, it is the first SKA block in Brazil and is characterized by the irreverence of the vocals, added to the balance of the kitchen and the weight of the brass, forming a mixture of rhythms that only happens in Skafolia. The block is a reference in Carnival events, the greatest reflection of Brazilian culture worldwide, and is also an excellent entertainment option.
skafolia.pressKitText: Download the SKAFOLIA press kit containing files to create promotional materials for shows and events! CONTAINS: Technical Rider, Stage Map, High resolution photos, release and the band's logo.

freeslack.description: Paradise Entretenimento has a partnership with Free Slack, an organization dedicated to the practice and dissemination of Slackline, a sport that is based on physical and mental balance, fundamental conditions for a healthy life. In addition to being a practice that adds and develops awareness and values ​​of unity, slackline contributes to a more peaceful society that is more integrated with the environment in which we live. Free Slack holds several events, developing workshops, presentations and social activities, aiming to provide opportunities for experience through sport.
